title: ChatGPT is dishing out questionable advice. Parents are eating it up.

content:

title: Microsoft wants to mainly use its own AI chips in the future
description: Microsoft has been developing its own chips for the data center designed to handle artificial intelligence workloads.
content:
Microsoft would like to mainly use its own chips in its data centers in the future, the tech giant's chief technology officer said on Wednesday, in a move which could reduce its reliance on major players like Nvidia and AMD .

title: Elon Musk Says He Is Building Grokipedia, An AI-Powered Wikipedia Rival
description: Elon Musk announced that his artificial intelligence (AI) company xAI will be building Grokipedia, which according to the billionaire is meant to serve as an alternative to Wikipedia. Musk made a post on his social media platform 'X' writing, "We are building Grokipedia @xAI. Will be a massive improvement over Wikipedia. Frankly, it is a necessary step towards the xAI goal of understanding the Universe."

title: AI tool detects hidden warning signs of disease by analyzing genetic building blocks within cells
description: McGill University researchers have developed an artificial intelligence tool that can detect previously invisible disease markers inside single cells.
content:
McGill University researchers have developed an artificial intelligence tool that can detect previously invisible disease markers inside single cells.

title: New AI enhances the view inside fusion energy systems
description: Imagine watching a favorite movie when suddenly the sound stops. The data representing the audio is missing. All that's left are images. What if artificial intelligence (AI) could analyze each frame of the video and provide the audio automatically based on the pictures, reading lips and noting each time a foot hits the ground?
